mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Square Dance Vacations -1959", ""Rodeo of Rounds" at the National Convention", "Requirements for a Round Dance Teacher", "Homes for Square Dancing, Part V", "The Club Dancer Has Responsibilities Too", "The Fiddler Plays On", "How to Give a "Premium Party"", "Teaching Gimmicks and Simple Dances Help Make Learning Easy", and "Couple Spark-Plug Square Dancing". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Style Series: Sides Divide", "Square Dance Picture", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Ladies on the Square: Some Recipes and a Center-Piece", "Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: Fred Bouvier", "Paging the Roundancers: Dick and Ella Reinsberg", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
